name: Gallic Wars: Battle Simulator Prologue
description:
Gallic Wars: Battle Simulator

is a rogue-like tactical strategy game.
Fast gameplay, crazy rag-doll physics and challenging rogue-like approach to strategy.
In this prologue you will command the mighty Gallic force to win a small campaign that will prepare you for the challenge of the main game.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1067760/Gallic_Wars_Battle_Simulator/

Features:

  • One of a kind approach to the strategy genre
  • Cartoony style inspired by Asterix and Obelix comic books
  • Fast gameplay
  • Powerful magic and mighty generals (generals available in the main game)
  • Ragdoll physics - everyone likes ragdoll physics

Fight your way through roman legions. DEPLOY your troops, PLAN their movement, use magic and items to give yourself an edge, and WIN



GAULS



Your warriors. Powerful and battle-hardened. Deploy them on a battlefield and watch the mayhem unfold. Feared by the “civilized” world for their ferocity in battle and questionable hygiene. Wild Berserkers, Archers and heavy armored Spearmen. Use them wisely, and you will conquer ROME!

ROMANS



There is strength in numbers! Weak, soft and simple, but in large numbers a challenge even for your warriors. Swordsmen, spearmen and archers - smash them with your troops and conquer ROME!
